EmailTemplate.name: CSM HHP Request Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Is Pending Approval For Service Plus Pro.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Service plus is for HHP (high horsepower) engines.
It has come to our attention that these types of subscriptions have been given in error throughout the years. Service plus is reserved for distributors and for approved fleets/dealers.
We are in the process of correcting this known issue. This is a managed program that requires further approval.
Please make sure to fill out questions below entirely and in detail, including Engine types and sizes. This will help determine what is needed for your units.
If you are Tax Exempt, please send an updated Tax Exemption Form to include your Cummins Account # to - CSSNATaxExempt@cummins.com so the Tax records can be updated for your account.
Thank you.
HHP Access Questions: • What HHP Engines do you work on? • What level of work do they perform or intend to perform on these engines? • Where do you get your parts from? • Do you have any level of certification? • Do you perform any warranty work on these or any other engines? • Do you perform any service or maintenance work on engines other than your own? • Why are you not using the resources of Cummins Sales and Service to service and repair these engines?
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
